answers.answer: There's definitely something wrong with them!
I mean I woukd knownif I had gest diabetes. I deff don't have it but damn they want to test me now!? Im too far along in pregnancy. I just didn't understand that!
They usually test at 26w they is something to worry if they haven't even schedule that appt..
I didn't get my done until today and I'm 31 weeks..I thought it was we weird my doctor office didn't order it sooner too
It's a bit frustrating bc on top of giving me the test late I don't even get a 1 hour like most pregnant woman get. I have had no complications throught pregnancy and their giving me a 3 hour! :(
That is really strange to just go ahead and give you the three hour test...seems like a waste of time unless of course you really had it..did they say why?
I will be almost 29 weeks when mine is done!!
My OBGYN's office told me they couldn't do it AFTER 27 weeks when I needed to push it back a week because of work scheduling conflicts
I'm 29weeks 2d and I'll b getting mine done tmrw smh I don't want to but I know I have too. But I really don't see y when I did my quad screening test they did a blood test checking for diabetes
That is ridiculous and to give you the 3 hour one first is even more ridiculous , but don't worry you're not alone my office is as stupid as yours. Good luck on your test.
Thanks! Yea they never told me why I have to take 3 hour! I never took this test during this pregnancy yet and they haven't told me anything is wrong.. its weird

question: Im 30 wks and 1 day and they Still have not got me in to see doc about taking the glucose test for gest diabetes! I finally have an app soon but ill be 32 wks!? Is there something wrong with this ob office? Or just me?
title: My obgyn is so stupid
